title: Syrian army clashes with Turkish forces in northeast border area - state tv
text:
AMMAN, Oct 30 (Reuters) - Syrian army troops on Wednesday were engaged in heavy clashes with Turkish forces in the countryside around the border town of Ras al Ain in an area where a military offensive by Ankara aims to create a "safe" zone, state media said.

It did not give details but Turkish-backed rebels said intermittent clashes have taken place in recent days with Syrian troops south of Ras al Ain, which was seized from Syrian Kurdish-led forces.

Syrian troops have with the agreement of Kurdish forces stepped in to take up positions in the area.







(Reporting by Suleiman Al-Khalidi, Editing by Angus MacSwan)
